title: DJ Sona looks incredible. @KateyChaos
body:
I'm sorry but that does NOT look like Arcade Sona. It also has some pretty sweet VFX and the model looks incredible. Definitely worth it when it comes out. Nice one RIOT!

Question Katey, during the process of the skins team making this skin, did they look at the feedback they were getting about it (Both the positive/negative, mainly the negative)?
